title: TVS Motors launches Ronin special edition
description: TVS Motor Company, a manufacturer of two-wheelers, revealed that their "modern-retro" motorcycle, the Ronin, will have a special edition version available for the holidays. One of the updates is a new graphic. It has three tones: grey for the main tone, white for the secondary tone, and a red stripe for the third tone on the side panel and tank.
